com.zebra.sdk.common.card.job.template

Interface ZebraTemplate

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ZebraCardTemplate

    public interface ZebraTemplate
    An interface used to define functions used in template related operations.

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • deleteTemplate

        void deleteTemplate(String templateName)
                    throws IllegalArgumentException,
                           ZebraCardException,
                           IOException
        Deletes the specified template.
        Parameters:
        templateName - the name of the template.
        Throws:
        ZebraCardException - on failure to delete the template.
        IllegalArgumentException - if specified template name is invalid.
        IOException - if specified template is not found or an error is encountered accessing the stored template file.

      • saveTemplate

        void saveTemplate(String templateName,
                String templateData)
                  throws IllegalArgumentException,
                         ZebraCardException,
                         IOException
        Saves the specified template.
        Parameters:
        templateName - the name of the template.
        templateData - the XML formatted template.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if specified template name already exists.
        IOException - on failure to store the template.
        ZebraCardException

      • getTemplate

        String getTemplate(String templateName)
                   throws IllegalArgumentException,
                          IOException
        Returns the specified template.
        Parameters:
        templateName - the name of the template.
        Returns:
        the XML formatted template.
        Throws:
        ZebraCardException - on failure to obtain the template.
        IllegalArgumentException - if specified template name is invalid.
        IOException - if specified template is not found or an I/O related error occurs.

      • getAllTemplateNames

        List<String> getAllTemplateNames()
                                 throws IOException
        Returns a list containing the stored template names.
        Returns:
        a list containing the stored template names.
        Throws:
        IOException - if an I/O related error occurs while accessing the stored templates.

      • getTemplateFields

        List<String> getTemplateFields(String templateName)
                               throws IllegalArgumentException,
                                      ZebraCardException,
                                      IOException
        Returns the template fields from the specified XML template.
        Parameters:
        templateName - the name of the template.
        Returns:
        a list containing the template field names and values.
        Throws:
        ZebraCardException - on failure to read the stored template data.
        IllegalArgumentException - if specified template name is null or empty.
        IOException - if specified template is not found or an I/O related error occurs.

      • generateTemplateJob

        TemplateJob generateTemplateJob(String templateName,
                              Map<String,String> fieldDataMap)
                                throws ZebraCardException,
                                       IOException,
                                       ConnectionException,
                                       SettingsException
        Returns an instance of TemplateJob containing the job specific data.
        Parameters:
        templateName - the name of the template.
        fieldDataMap - a map containing the template field names as the keys and the template field values for the key values.
        Returns:
        generated instance of TemplateJob.
        Throws:
        ConnectionException - if the device is busy or an error occurs communicating with the printer.
        IOException - on failure to locate/access the referenced template or image files.
        SettingsException - if an error occurs while generating the template job.
        ZebraCardException - on template job generation error.

      • generateTemplateDataJob

        TemplateJob generateTemplateDataJob(String templateData,
                                  Map<String,String> fieldDataMap)
                                    throws ConnectionException,
                                           SettingsException,
                                           ZebraCardException,
                                           IOException
        Returns an instance of TemplateJob containing the job specific data.
        Parameters:
        templateData - the XML formatted template data.
        fieldDataMap - a map containing the template field names as the keys and the template field values for the key values.
        Returns:
        generated instance of TemplateJob.
        Throws:
        ConnectionException - if the device is busy or an error occurs communicating with the printer.
        IOException - on failure to locate/access the referenced template or image files.
        SettingsException - if an error occurs while generating the template job.
        ZebraCardException - on template job generation error.

      • deleteTemplateImage

        void deleteTemplateImage(String imageName)
                         throws ZebraCardException,
                                IOException
        Deletes the specified template image.
        Parameters:
        imageName - image name.
        Throws:
        ZebraCardException - on failure to delete the specified image.
        IOException - if specified image is not found or an error is encountered accessing the stored image file.

      • getAllTemplateImageNames

        List<String> getAllTemplateImageNames()
                                      throws IOException
        Gets a list of all stored template images.
        Returns:
        a list containing the template image file names.
        Throws:
        IOException - if an error is encountered while accessing the stored image files.

      • getTemplateImageData

        byte[] getTemplateImageData(String imageName)
                            throws IOException,
                                   IllegalArgumentException
        Returns the raw image data from the specified image name.
        Parameters:
        imageName - the name of the image.
        Returns:
        the image data.
        Throws:
        IOException - if specified image is not found.
        IllegalArgumentException - if the specified image name is empty or null.

      • saveTemplateImage

        void saveTemplateImage(String imageName,
                     byte[] imageData)
                       throws IOException,
                              IllegalArgumentException
        Saves the specified template image.
        Parameters:
        imageName - the name of the image.
        imageData - the image data.
        Throws:
        IOException - on failure to save image data.
        IllegalArgumentException - if the specified image name and/or data is empty or null.

      • convertDataDocumentToDataMap

        Map<String,String> convertDataDocumentToDataMap(String dataDocument)
                                                throws IllegalArgumentException,
                                                       ZebraCardException
        Converts a JSON or XML formatted template data document into a Map.
        Parameters:
        dataDocument - JSON or XML formatted template data document.
        Returns:
        a map containing the template field names as the keys and the template field values for the key values.
        Throws:
        ZebraCardException - on data parsing error.
        IllegalArgumentException - on invalid dataDocument value or format.
